pages.name: FTP
pages.description: The Neuro FTP server for random Neuro-sama content. Click for connection info.

pages.name: NeuroSynth Project
pages.description:
Details on the NeuroSynth project, an effort to recreate a production quality Neuro-sama voicebank.
Also contains information on commissioning a custom Neuro song cover from Superbox using NeuroSynth, how to support the project, and more.
